materials.raw_text:
Ba (Barium): 75 g 
 Ni (Nickel): 58.7 g 
 P (Phosphorus): 31.0 g 
 V (Vanadium): 51.0 g

sourcing.instructions:
Ba: Purchase from a chemical supply store or online supplier (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich, Alfa Aesar). 
 Ni: Available from metal supply stores or online vendors. 
 P: Obtain from a chemical supplier, often in the form of red or white phosphorus. 
 V: Can be sourced from specialized metal suppliers or chemical distributors.

preparation.raw_text:
